question: [Note] Norsk: Oppgi which integer bin occurs most frequently basert pa histogrammet.

qas.question: [Note] Norsk: Oppgi which integer bin occurs most frequently basert pa histogrammet.
[Calm] Norsk: Oppgi how many samples were used in total basert pa histogrammet.
[Check] Deutsch: Gib how many entries fall inside the modal bin anhand des Histogramms an.
